name: TalkErieWZTE
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: talk erie
des: We are Erie, Pennsylvania’s home for breaking news and informative talk. Listen for Erie News Talk Radio at it’s finest, with national news twice an hour 24/7 and local news daytime weekdays, you’ll be informed and challenged every minute you spend with TalkErie.com. Click around the website and learn about our hosts and programs, including a local show singularly-focused on the Erie region: the Joel Natalie Show, weekdays and Saturdays from 3:00 to 6:00.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
